data.lyric:
[ti:Don't Pretend]
[ar:Khalid/Safe]
[al:Don't Pretend]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Don't Pretend - Khalid/SAFE
[00:02.57]Lyrics by：Khalid Robinson/Ryan Vojtesak/Shane Lee Lindstrom/Martin "Doc" McKinney
[00:05.15]Composed by：Khalid Robinson/Ryan Vojtesak/Shane Lee Lindstrom/Martin "Doc" McKinney
[00:07.73]Khalid：
[00:10.31]I feel like I'm losing you whenever I'm offline
[00:15.84]No one ever had you I used to pretend that you're mine
[00:21.25]I feel like there's nothing for me here but still I try
[00:26.57]I feel like there's nothing for me here but still I try
[00:32.55]Bruising my finger hitting your line
[00:37.42]If I'm holding back I might just lose my mind
[00:41.88]So alone
[00:42.83]Khalid/SAFE：
[00:43.62]Keeping my phone alive
[00:45.94]Alive
[00:46.49]Hoping that you call this time
[00:48.41]Oh I
[00:49.03]Thought I heard your ringing
[00:51.20]You
[00:51.68]You know I hear things sometimes
[00:54.59]Call my line call my line
[00:59.85]Come alive come alive
[01:03.34]Show me don't pretend
[01:08.79]Show me don't pretend
[01:14.20]Show me don't pretend
[01:16.07]Khalid：
[01:16.27]Keepin' you on my radar
[01:19.01]Lately you're so d**n cold
[01:21.61]You used to hold me down
[01:24.18]You're far so it's been a while
[01:26.99]I still remember your voice
[01:29.50]How you talk so soft in the morning
[01:32.37]You're the only one I'm wanting
[01:35.20]Love stays still and I'm frozen
[01:38.10]But I'm opening thoughts that I keep within I
[01:43.24]Guess I gotta be a man
[01:45.69]I tried as hard as I can
[01:47.90]Khalid/SAFE：
[01:48.48]Keeping my phone alive
[01:50.54]You
[01:51.09]Hoping that you call this time
[01:53.71]Thought I heard you ringin'
[01:56.36]You know I hear things sometimes
[01:59.22]Call my line call my line
[02:04.53]Come alive come alive
[02:08.15]Show me don't pretend
[02:13.54]Show me don't pretend
[02:18.88]Show me don't pretend
[02:24.30]Show me don't pretend
[02:29.70]Show me don't pretend
[02:31.77]Come alive oh-yeah
[02:35.24]Show me don't pretend
[02:37.98]Yeah yeah
[02:40.48]Show me don't pretend
data.trans:
[ti:Don't Pretend]
[ar:Khalid/Safe]
[al:Don't Pretend]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.57]//
[00:05.15]//
[00:07.73]//
[00:10.31]每次挂断电话 我就感觉要失去你了
[00:15.84]谁也不曾得到过你 我以前总是骗自己说 你是属于我的
[00:21.25]我明知可能毫无进展 却还是义无反顾
[00:26.57]我明知可能毫无进展 却还是义无反顾
[00:32.55]无数次尝试 只为打通你的电话
[00:37.42]如果让我克制自己 我可能会疯掉吧
[00:41.88]独自一人
[00:42.83]//
[00:43.62]电话随时处于待机状态
[00:45.94]待机状态
[00:46.49]希望这次你会打电话过来
[00:48.41]我
[00:49.03]好像听到电话铃声响了
[00:51.20]你
[00:51.68]你知道有时候我会出现幻觉
[00:54.59]给我打电话 快给我打电话
[00:59.85]快醒过来 快醒过来
[01:03.34]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[01:08.79]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[01:14.20]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[01:16.07]//
[01:16.27]我一直疯狂地找你
[01:19.01]最近你变得好冷漠
[01:21.61]以前你还会紧紧抱住我
[01:24.18]你已经离开很久了
[01:26.99]可我还清楚地记得你的声音
[01:29.50]清晨的时候你说话的声音是那么温柔
[01:32.37]你是我唯一想要得到的人
[01:35.20]对你的爱一如既往 我很伤心
[01:38.10]但我把以前藏在心底的想法都说出来了
[01:43.24]我想我得像真正的男人一样
[01:45.69]我竭尽所能
[01:47.90]//
[01:48.48]电话随时处于待机状态
[01:50.54]你
[01:51.09]希望这次你会打电话过来
[01:53.71]好像听到电话铃声响了
[01:56.36]你知道有时候我会出现幻觉
[01:59.22]给我打电话 快给我打电话
[02:04.53]快醒过来 快醒过来
[02:08.15]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[02:13.54]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[02:18.88]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[02:24.30]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[02:29.70]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[02:31.77]快醒过来
[02:35.24]快出现吧 别躲起来了
[02:37.98]//
[02:40.48]快出现吧 别躲起来了
